tasks.description: IoT hardware development on LoRa, Bluetooth Low Energy, WiFi 6 and NFC
Native and cross-platform mobile application development using Java and Flutter
Developing test programs using C, C#, Golang and LabView
Develop websites (frontend and CMS) and mobile applications according to client's specifications and wireframes

Clients included King Fook Jewellery, Ayes, Walk Duck and more
